name: Polar Gloves
tooltip:
Polar GlovesLevel 60

Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 5 Frozen Runes, 12 Enchanted Leather, 3 Essence of Water, 3 Cured Rugged Hides and 200 gold.

Requirements:
- Frozen Rune x 5
- Enchanted Leather x 12
- Essence of Water x 3
- Cured Rugged Hide x 3
- Money:200
